branchItem.name: CG5-S
CJ5-S
branchItem.description: <p>Series CJ5-S is a small bore stainless steel cylinder, designed for use in environments with water spray (such as food processing machines). A special scraper (standard) prevents water from entering the cylinder. Non-toxic additives allow confident use in equipment for food, beverage and medical products, etc. The CJ5-S series can be disassembled for replacement of seals.</p>

branchItem.name: NCM
branchItem.description: SMC's series NCM-X6009 utilizes the same quality features and is dimensionally interchangeable with the NCM standard series.  NCM-X6009's external components are all 303/304 stainless steel.  The series is available in 6 bore sizes and with auto switch capability.  Options include food grade grease, viton wiper, viton seals and a urethane cushion.  High and low temperature options are also available on models without auto switch magnet and/or the urethane cushion.
